The appropriate dress was worn comfortable enough maybe a little tight although strange. It was wrinkled on the back cover after a day. However, the skin-like coating perhaps the waterproof top layer separated the underlying leather creating a blister fold within a week. The blister was torn revealing the leather underneath. I'm sure the month will be over soon. I look bad. Dress. I suspect the waterproofing is compromised. I'm glad I didn't pay full price.
